FROM mcr.microsoft.com/powershell

# Install git, process tools
RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install git procps \
    # Clean up
    && apt-get autoremove -y \
    && apt-get clean -y \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
